title: [Gameplay] Weird Gragas Ult and Urgot E interaction.
body: I played a game and I used Explosive Cask on Urgot in the middle of his E, but he still completed the dash as if my ult did not hit him but it clearly did, when watching the replay. Is this a bug?

replies.body: urgot is unstoppable in his cast.
he isn't unstoppable, he timed his e so it went off after the stun. it works the same as tristana's W. not a bug nontheless
